title: Bill Simmons on the Patriots' Rise to the No. 1 Seed and Playoff Expectations
description:
Bill Simmons joins Nora and Mal to discuss the Patriots quickly becoming a top team in the AFC, which teams the Patriots should be worried about, and what makes this season a success for New England.

Hosts: Nora Princiotti and Mallory Rubin
Guest: Bill Simmons
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
